originalText.text:
I recently had a breast reduction performed by Dr. Glasberg, and I couldn't be happier with the results. While some reviews mention concerns about bedside manner, I personally found that Dr. Glasberg's skill and expertise more than made up for any perceived shortcomings in that area.

From the initial consultation to the post-surgery follow-ups, Dr. Glasberg and his team were professional, attentive, and focused on providing the best possible care. The results of my breast reduction exceeded my expectations, and I'm grateful for the positive impact it has had on my life.

If you're looking for a surgeon who delivers outstanding results, I highly recommend Dr. Glasberg. His work truly speaks for itself, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the entire experience.

originalText.text: I like many others was hesitant to get breast reduction surgery but after I scheduled a consultation with Dr. Scot I knew I was in good hands. The entire staff was calm, friendly and very transparent with everything from how I would feel after surgery to cost. I am feeling grateful for the choice I made and the doctor I chose. It's been six days since my surgery and I am feeling better each day! The best part is he does more than just breast reductions! Worth the hype and worth the $$$.

originalText.text: He doesn’t really have social skills but I can tell he’s working on it, I wrote down everything I wanted to ask him before I got to the office I did that for my post op appointments as well if he don’t answer I asked again at the end of the visit. I had breast reduction surgery and he did a great job I’m 3mths post op and I love them no complications anything I needed to ask the front desk answered, but after my third appointment no one answer the phone now only the answering service and no one returns my call since 11/17/2023 and I’m suppose to have two more post op appointment.

originalText.text:
I had surgery with Dr. Glassberg in September 2023.  I must say, the process from A-Z was amazing.
From the process manager Leanne Rodriguez to the Doctor and his team at the hospital.  They made me feel very comfortable and at ease.
I highly recommend Dr. Glasberg and his team.   Call Leanne today to schedule your consult.  You won’t be disappointed.

originalText.text: Excellent surgeon with expert skills. I could not be happier with the results of my surgeries. I visited many surgeons and clearly made the right choice. His staff is wonderful and helpful and caring.
